name: Crossite II
description:
Crossite II is the new sequel to the original game Crossite I!

All new towers!

Triples, Rifles, Pyros, Canons!

4 New Maps! 

New Enemys?

Tougher Waves and games.

and much more!

Crossite II is a Tower Defense game that is difficult and requires thinking and skills to beat Team Crossite enemys, Errosite.

What is it about?

Also, did we mention it is free and avalible on multiple platforms? Come over and find more details about the game and where you can play it!

https://sites.google.com/view/al-studios-games/home

Play it now, we know you want too!

Check out our Website!
